normalised: A-I is definitely going to change things up, no doubt. My cousin, Priya, works at T-C-S and she is saying they are already using A-I for coding assistance, like autocompleting tasks. Heard from my bhai, Rakesh, that even local shops are using A-I chatbots for customer service now â€“ imagine, a bot selling you chai and samosas! But I am still a bit skeptical, will it actually replace jobs? Also, saw this article saying A-I needs tons of data, like thousands of gigabytes, to even learn properly.
